'Evolve' is the twelfth studio album by singer-songwriter Ani DiFranco, released
in 2003 (see 2003 in music). The album won DiFranco and Brian Grunert a Grammy
Award for Best Recording Package in
2004. http://www.righteousbabe.com/ani/evolve/grammy.asp Evolve Wins the
2004 Grammy Award for Best Recording Package This album is more eclectic
and stylistically venturous than DiFranco's previous works, experimenting with
styles such as jazz and funk.
